meta.description: Web>List Module labels (standard module labels plus a load of labels for the List module itself).

languageKey.label: List of database-records
The Web>List module provides low level access to records appearing on a page.
List
Paste after: Clipboard content is inserted after this record
Paste into: Clipboard content is inserted on this page
Paste in clipboard content
Mark All/Mark none
Transfer the selection of records to clipboard
Mark duplicates
Edit marked
Delete marked
Are you sure you want to delete all marked records from the table '%s'?
Display information
Edit record
Edit page properties
New record
Create new page after this page
Create new record after this record
Create new record
Move up in list
Move down in list
Re-position content element
Move page
Hide record
Un-hide record
Hide page
Un-hide page
Move this page to the position after the current parent page (Inwards)
Move this page to be a subpage of the page above (Outwards)
Delete record (!)
Display change history / Un-do
Display versions
Set permissions for page
Extended view
List all tables
List only this table
Show clipboard
Edit all shown fields of the listed records
Edit the '%s' field of the listed records
Are you sure you want to delete this record?

Default
All languages
